thread.title: BRIEF-Gibson Energy Announces Sale Of U.S. Energy Services Businesses For $125 Mln

title: BRIEF-Gibson Energy Announces Sale Of U.S. Energy Services Businesses For $125 Mln

organizations.name: brief-gibson energy announces sale of u.s. energy services
mln reuters staff   gibson energy inc

text: 18 PM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-Gibson Energy Announces Sale Of U.S. Energy Services Businesses For $125 Mln Reuters Staff   Gibson Energy Inc: * GIBSON ENERGY ANNOUNCES SALE OF U.S. ENERGY SERVICES BUSINESSES FOR $125 MILLION * GIBSON ENERGY - ‍ENTERED INTO 2 DEALS FOR DIVESTITURE OF U.S. ENERGY SERVICES BUSINESSES, INCLUDING U.S. ENVIRONMENTAL SERVICES AND U.S. SEISMIC ASSETS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
